title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk the eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Combine the pasta with pancetta and mix in the egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, garam masala, and ginger-garlic paste.
Cook the chicken in a pan until golden brown.
Saut√© onions and add pureed tomatoes and cook until the sauce thickens.
Add the chicken, cream, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A healthy and quick stir-fry with mixed vegetables, tofu, and soy sauce.
instructions: Stir-fry tofu in olive oil until golden.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Add soy sauce and stir to coat.
